data.name: 112 Operator - The Last Duty
data.detailed_description:
More from Games Operators

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1465460/Infection_Free_Zone/


About the Game

Infected have arrived

A deadly infection spreads among the citizens. Once bitten, the victims cannot be saved. The Infected are aggressive and you will have to take a completely new approach to deal with them.

Army is on your side

Army has arrived to aid you. Manage new military units to fight off the Infected. Will your knowledge and skills as an emergency dispatcher be enough to face this terrifying danger?

The Last Duty

It is not possible to save everyone anymore. But your mission is to give it your all, until the very end. Protect the citizens, fight the infected, join the definitive experience in 112 Operator.

It is not possible to save everyone anymore. But your mission is to give it your all, until the very end. Protect the citizens, fight the infected, join the definitive experience in 112 Operator.
data.short_description: The time has come for your last duty. For how long can you protect your area? What threats await you? This semi-realistic DLC brings new exciting gameplay to the game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz, multi-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
